title: Ticket #1262: Keep history of GridJobID attribute in job classad -  a LastGridJobID
description:
Once the job is either completed or held/idle and still in the queue, there is no record in the ClassAd of which grid job id it last ran on. This information is in the UserLog but these are often configured to be either deleted on the spot or common to tens of thousands of jobs and it is hard to extract.

Would it be possible to add a list of LastGridJobId similar in spirit to LastRemoteHost or LastMatchName0, LastMatchName1, etc.? It would be very valuable to have this information in the classad where it is readily accessible to queries via condor_q and condor_history.

Attached RUST ticket has more details
remarks:
2010-Mar-05 10:14:15 by tannenba:
I wonder... would it be possible/better to add a more general mechanism, perhaps at the schedd qmgmt level, to keep historical versions of any given attribute?
2010-Oct-20 16:03:30 by jfrey:
Bulk change of target version from v070504 to v070505 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Jan-27 14:46:04 by danb:
Bulk change of target version from v070505 to v070506 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Feb-01 16:01:00 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.
creator: tannenba
